1.2.3.changes:
Fixed a bug where the application would crash when attempting to save a file
Added a new feature that allows users to export data to CSV format
Improved the overall performance of the application

2.0.1.changes:
Completely redesigned user interface for a more modern and user-friendly experience
Added support for multiple languages
Improved security features to protect user data

3.1.0.changes:
Added support for integration with popular third-party services such as Google Drive and Dropbox
Improved image processing capabilities with new image editing tools
Fixed a number of bugs that were causing the application to crash
